item.title: Tusker
item.description: Your team has outgrown Excel and WhatsApp, but you’re not ready for enterprise software. What worked at 5 people breaks at 15. Spreadsheets, WhatsApp, quick calls - they got you here, but they can’t scale. Enterprise tools like Jira take months to set up and teams never adopt them.
